briefdescription.para: Find tail of packet ("\r\n") in buffer and check control sum (CRC).

parameterdescription.para: a constant character pointer of packets buffer.
buffer size.
a integer pointer for return CRC of packet (must be defined).

simplesect.para: Number of bytes to packet tail.

buffer size.
a pointer of packet which will filled by function.

simplesect.para: 1 (true) - if parsed successfully or 0 (false) - if fail.
